data.name: CreateLegalReferralAssignment
CreateMonitoredActivityAssignment
ReadCase
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, STATUS from CKT_CASE where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadGlobalReassignment
data.value: select top(1) CREATED_TIMESTAMP, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, PROCESS_DATE, STATUS_FLAG, OVERRIDE_FLAG, BUSINESS_OBJ_CODE, ASSIGN_REASON_CODE, SPD_GENERATED_ID, OFF_GENERATED_ID, OSP_ROLE_CODE, OSP_EFFECTIVE_DATE, SPD_GENERATED_ID1, OFF_GENERATED_ID1, OSP_ROLE_COD, OSP_EFFECTIVE_DAT, BO_COUNT, MON_COUNT from CKT_GLOBAL_REASSGN where CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp

data.name: ReadInfrastructureMonitoredActivity
data.value: select T1.SYSTEM_GENERATED_I, T1.SITUATION_NUMBER, T1.PROCESS_STATUS, T1.EVENT_ID, T1.EVENT_TYPE, T1.EVENT_DETAIL_NAME, T1.REASON_CODE, T1.BUSINESS_OBJECT_CD, T1.DENORM_NUMERIC_12, T1.DENORM_TEXT_12, T1.DENORM_DATE, T1.DENORM_TIMESTAMP, T1.INITIATING_ST_CD, T1.CSENET_IN_OUT_CODE, T1.CASE_NUMBER, T1.CSE_PERSON_NUM, T1.CASE_UNIT_NUM, T1.USER_ID, T1.CREATED_BY, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T1.LAST_UPDATED_TMST, T1.REFERENCE_DATE, T1.[FUNCTION], T1.CASE_UNIT_STATE, T1.DETAIL, T2.SYSTEM_GENERATED_I, T2.CLOSURE_REASON_COD, T2.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T2.LAST_UPDATED_TMST from CKT_INFRASTRUCTURE T1 join CKT_MONITORED_ACT T2 on (T1.CASE_NUMBER = @caseNumber) and (T1.BUSINESS_OBJECT_CD = @businessObjectCd) and (T1.SYSTEM_GENERATED_I = T2.INF_SYS_GEN_ID) and (T2.CLOSURE_REASON_COD = ' ')

data.name: ReadLegalReferral
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, IDENTIFIER from CKT_LEGAL_REFERRAL where (IDENTIFIER = @identifier) and (CAS_NUMBER = @casNumber)

data.name: ReadLegalReferralAssignment
data.value: select REASON_CODE, OVERRIDE_IND, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, SPD_ID, OFF_ID, OSP_CODE, OSP_DATE, CAS_NO, LGR_ID from CKT_ASSGN_LEG_REF where (@ospDate = OSP_DATE) and (@ospCode = OSP_CODE) and (@offId = OFF_ID) and (@spdId = SPD_ID) and (EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate) and (REASON_CODE = @reasonCode)

data.name: ReadMonitoredActivityAssignment
data.value: select top(1) SYSTEM_GENERATED_I, REASON_CODE, RESPONSIBILITY_COD, EFFECTIVE_DATE, OVERRIDE_IND, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, SPD_ID, OFF_ID, OSP_CODE, OSP_DATE, MAC_ID from CKT_ASSGN_MNT_ACT where (@macId = MAC_ID) and (EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate) and (@ospDate = OSP_DATE) and (@ospCode = OSP_CODE) and (@offId = OFF_ID) and (@spdId = SPD_ID)

data.name: ReadOffice1
data.value: select top(1) OFFICE_ID, OFF_OFFICE from CKT_OFFICE where OFFICE_ID = @officeId

data.name: ReadOffice2
data.value: select top(1) OFFICE_ID, OFF_OFFICE from CKT_OFFICE where OFFICE_ID = @officeId

data.name: ReadOfficeServiceProvider1
data.value: select top(1) SPD_GENERATED_ID, OFF_GENERATED_ID, ROLE_CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE from CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR where (EFFECTIVE_DATE = @effectiveDate) and (ROLE_CODE = @roleCode) and (OFF_GENERATED_ID = @offGeneratedId) and (SPD_GENERATED_ID = @spdGeneratedId)

data.name: ReadOfficeServiceProvider2
data.value: select top(1) SPD_GENERATED_ID, OFF_GENERATED_ID, ROLE_CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE from CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR where (EFFECTIVE_DATE = @effectiveDate) and (ROLE_CODE = @roleCode) and (OFF_GENERATED_ID = @offGeneratedId) and (SPD_GENERATED_ID = @spdGeneratedId)

data.name: ReadServiceProvider1
data.value: select top(1) SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, USER_ID from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER where SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = @servicePrvderId

data.name: ReadServiceProvider2
data.value: select top(1) SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, USER_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER where SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = @servicePrvderId

data.name: UpdateLegalReferralAssignment
data.value: update CKT_ASSGN_LEG_REF set DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst where (CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp) and (SPD_ID = @spdId) and (OFF_ID = @offId) and (OSP_CODE = @ospCode) and (OSP_DATE = @ospDate) and (CAS_NO = @casNo) and (LGR_ID = @lgrId)

data.name: UpdateMonitoredActivityAssignment
data.value: update CKT_ASSGN_MNT_ACT set DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst where (CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp) and (SPD_ID = @spdId) and (OFF_ID = @offId) and (OSP_CODE = @ospCode) and (OSP_DATE = @ospDate) and (MAC_ID = @macId)
